news.title: Trump tax bill clears the House in a victory for Republicans, advances to the Senate
news.summary: The early morning vote along party lines came after 48 hours of furious negotiations to win over warring factions in the Republican conference. The vote was on a party-by-party basis.

news.title: Sam Altman's $6.4 billion bet on Jony Ive has Zuckerberg-like qualities
news.summary: OpenAI is making a big bet in purchasing Jony Ive's nascent startup, but it's a deal reminiscent of some made by Mark Zuckerberg.

news.title: Solar stocks plunge as Republican tax bill worse than feared for clean energy
news.summary: The Republican legislation takes a "sledgehammer" to the Inflation Reduction Act, Jefferies says. Jefferies: The legislation is a way to get rid of the inflation reduction act.

news.title: Person shot outside CIA headquarters by security guards
news.summary: The non-fatal shooting on CIA property occurred hours after two Israeli Embassy staff members were shot and killed outside D.C.'s Capital Jewish Museum.

news.title: The Republican spending bill is sending yields soaring and creating a major market headache
news.summary: For now, Wall Street experts are not optimistic about what happens from here. "I don't think it's going to get much better," says one.

news.title: Two software companies are going public. The IPO market is getting up off the mat.
news.summary: The market for initial public offerings continues to gear up after an absence of deals in recent weeks. Initial public offerings have been on the decline in recent months.

news.title: Jobless claims point to steady job growth in May
news.summary: The big question in the coming months is whether payroll reductions accelerate as tariffs hit the economy. The U.S. economy is expected to grow at a rate of about 2.5 percent this year.

news.title: This investor banks on Munger’s advice to ride out volatility in markets and Tesla
news.summary: Money manager Christopher Tsai says he pays scant attention to daily market ups and downs, except to look for stock opportunities. Tsai: "I don't pay attention to what's going on in the market. I just look for opportunities"

news.title: BJ’s Wholesale’s stock rises as outlook maintained, despite a sales miss and tariffs
news.summary: BJ's maintained its guidance while the broader retail sector is wrestling with the fallout from the Trump administration’s sweeping wave of tariffs.

news.title: Here come the price hikes: Nike is increasing prices by up to 7%.
news.summary: Nike reportedly is hiking prices by as much as 7%, according to various media reports. The apparel maker is not tying the cost increases directly to tariffs.
